title: A "friend" tried to steal my account
body: So,I had one guy named .... (damn I wanna say his name here, but yeah... rules). He sent me a link for a Halloween Event ... It was fake ofc, but I was drunk at this time, so I didnt really care.. he was really friendly and etc ... after all he's in my friend list and I try to avoid inviting negative ppl, looks like I will have to clean this list. Anyway, I've managed to change my pass and e-mail after that, but just wondering in case I could save them do I need a ticket for restoration ... I mean the only reason I write now is that I want to name this guy so he get punished. Hopefully you guys have some chat log files or something :S I will check my browser history about the link if it's needed to be given.

replies.body: A lot of people send these links thinking they're legit though. Are you sure he was trying to steal your account?

If you'd like to inquire about your account or have us take a look at any suspicious changes as a result of this incident, submit a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Steal? I Think not. I personally got these halloween giveaway stuff but it didn't work sadly. You shouldn't be mad at your friend.
